name: No More Bleeding
description:
In 3021, humanity is still here... but what's left of it?

You might be disapointed of what they are doing to us...

Play as a resistant who cares about human beings, she got caught by some robot and will be exchanged for a weapon. You'll have the opportunity to save many of your fellows. Will you manage to free them from bing tortured to death?

CONTROLS (you can set them up in the launcher, input window):

WASD/Arrowkeys --> Movements
Spacebar --> Jump

We worked with a compositer for this jam, you can find the music of the game on her soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/ariproduction/no-more-bleeding/s-uKh1R
